p:
Statistical analyses were performed as described in
37 . One-way ANOVA, followed by a Tukey’s HSD test, were used to determine differences in toxicity percentages ( P < 0.05) (SAS for Window release 6, SAS Institute). Log-probit regression was used to determine the LC 50 based on corrected mortality from different chemical concentrations (SAS for Windows release 6, SAS Institute). All analyses were performed in SAS version 9.4. One- or two-way ANOVA was used to determine differences ( P < 0.05) for mRNA quantification and RNA-seq. Graphs were drawn using Prism 8 (GraphPad, Inc., San Diego, CA, USA).
